def palindrome(m):
   n = m[::-1]
   ans = str(int(n) + int(m))
   return ans

def isPalindrome(m):
   n = m[::-1]
   if n == m:
      return True
   return False
   

t = int(raw_input())
for i in range(t):
   n = raw_input()
   num = 0
   while not isPalindrome(n):
      n = palindrome(n)
      num += 1
   print num, n
